name: ClickIT Smart Technologies
description:
At ClickIT we have built more than 200 cloud-native SaaS applications for startups and mid-large enterprises helping them to adopt Continuous Integration, Micro-services, Automation and AWS Auto Scaling.
It can be...
...FOR ANY Open Source Stack: PHP Laravel, Node.js (Mean Stacks), WordPress High performance, Ruby on rails and Python.
...TO ANY Cloud Platform: Amazon Web Services - AWS, Google Cloud Platform - GCP and Azure. Or any Cloud Hosting.
...FOR ANY Digital Agency: Startups, mid-large enterprises, Marketing Agencies, Financial services FINTECH and Healthcare-HIPAA, Big Data, Web design agencies and Software Development firms.
As AWS DevOps experts we help startups to grow from its conception to complex million user Cloud Architecture.
OUR KEY to be your Innovative IT Partner: Same Timezone, DevOps and AWS Experts, Near Shore web development and Customer obsessed
READ MORE...
